nodes.text: Ariavos was a male Human living during the Cold War and Galactic War. At one point he resided on Ord Mantell where he used the Bounty Brokers Association to put a bounty onto ex-Republic Colonel Brogon and his henchmen, who defected and turned to extortion.
Ariavos first appeared in game update 2.3 of the MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2013. He is voice by Fred Tatasciore.
He is only accessible through the Bounty Contract Week event quest series of the Republic players in the game on Ord Mantell.
